News.headline: Match Preview: Eastleigh v Dagenham and Redbridge 201617
News.page_title: Match Preview: Eastleigh v Dagenham and Redbridge 201617
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Eastleigh v Dagenham and Redbridge 201617
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers National League away fixture against Eastleigh on Saturday.
News.description:
The Daggers are looking to bounce back from their midweek defeat at the hands of Torquay which left them sitting 3rd in the table.
 
Ronnie Moore’s Eastleigh currently sit two places below the Daggers in 5th. Eastleigh are unbeaten in their last ten in the league.
 
Previous 5 Results
 
Daggers
Torquay 1-0 Daggers
Daggers 0-0 Tranmere
Bromley 1-3 Daggers
Daggers 2-0 North Ferriby
Daggers 2-0 Dover
 
Eastleigh
Eastleigh 3-0 Maidstone
Woking 3-3 Eastleigh
Eastleigh 2-0 Sutton
Macclesfield 0-1 Eastleigh
Forest Green 1-1 Eastleigh
  
Team News
Daggers look to still be without Luke Pennell, Luke Guttridge and Curtley Williams due to injuries. Andre Boucaud is unavailable due to international duty whilst Captain Scott Doe serves a one match ban.
 
Previous Meetings
This is the first time that the two teams would have met in the league.
 
National League
There is a full list of fixtures in the league on Saturday. All kick off at 3pm unless stated.
 
Aldershot V Solihull
Barrow V Maidstone
Braintree V York
Bromley V Lincoln
Chester V Torquay
Eastleigh V Dagenham and Redbridge
Gateshead V Dover
Guiseley V Southport
Macclesfield V Boreham Wood
North Ferriby V Forest Green
Sutton V Woking
Tranmere V Wrexham (12:15)
 
Tickets 
Ticket information for the game can be found here.
  
Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on on the website.

Travel News:
All travel information for the game away at Eastleigh tomorrow can be found here.
